Package distributed

Class Master

  • java.lang.Object
    • distributed.Master
  • public class Master
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a Master that counts the occurrencies of words in a given text file by running a Slave program over distant machines.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Master()
      Empty constructor

      • testSSH

        public void testSSH​(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<java.lang.String> machines,
                    java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String file,
                    int maxThreads)
        This method tests SSH connection with the machines of the file of available machines.
        Parameters:
        machines - List of machines that were tested positive.
        username - Username for establishing tKeyhe ssh connection
        file - Name of the file that contains the list of available machines.
        maxThreads - Maximum size of the ThreadPoolExecuor

      • makeDir

        public void makeDir​(java.lang.String machine,
                    java.lang.String dir,
                    boolean local,
                    int MaxNumberOfTries)
        This method creates a directory, allowing to decide between doing it in the local machine or in a distant one
        Parameters:
        machine - Machine in which it has to create the directory.
        dir - Name of the directory to create
        local - Flag that indicates if the directory should be created in the local machine or in a distant one
        MaxNumberOfTries - Maximum number of times we may try to establish an ssh connection

      • putFile

        public void putFile​(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<java.lang.String> machines,
                    java.lang.String path,
                    java.lang.String file,
                    java.lang.String destDir,
                    java.lang.String destFile,
                    int amount,
                    int max_threads,
                    int MaxNumberOfTries)
        This method puts a file in a distant machine. If the directory does not exist, it creates it.
        Parameters:
        machines - List of machines
        path - Local path of the file
        file - Name of the file
        destDir - Name of the directory in which it has to copy the file
        destFile - Name of the file in the distant machine
        amount - Number of machines to which it has to copy the file
        max_threads - Maximum size of the ThreadPoolExecuor
        MaxNumberOfTries - Maximum number of times we may try to establish an ssh connection

      • runSlaveMap

        public void runSlaveMap​(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<java.lang.String> machines,

                        int maxThreads,
                        int amount,
                        int MaxNumberOfTries)
        This method runs the map phase of the slave.
        Parameters:
        machines - List of machines
        destDir - Name of the working directory
        amount - Number of machines to which it has to copy the file
        maxThreads - Maximum size of the ThreadPoolExecuor
        MaxNumberOfTries - Maximum number of times we may try to establish an ssh connection

      • generateSplits

        public int generateSplits​(java.lang.String inputFile,
                          java.lang.String destDir,
                          int numberOfSplits)
        This method generates approximatively numberOfSplits splits with the same amount of lines.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - Name of the file to divide
        destDir - Name of the directory in which the splits will be placed
        numberOfSplits - Amount of splits to generate -1

      • distributeSplits

        public int distributeSplits​(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<java.lang.String> machines,
                            java.lang.String file,
                            java.lang.String sourceDir,
                            int maxThreads,
                            int sufixLength,
                            int MaxNumberOfTries)
        This method distributes created splits in distant machines indicated in the queue. It writes in a file the names of the machines that are being used.
        Parameters:
        machines - List of machines
        file - Name of the file in which it has to write the list of used machines
        sourceDir - Name of the directory in which the splits were be placed
        maxThreads - Maximum size of the ThreadPoolExecuor
        suffixLength - Number of digits each split has
        MaxNumberOfTries - Maximum number of times we may try to establish an ssh connection
        Returns:
        Amount of splits

      • retreiveResults

        public void retreiveResults​(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<java.lang.String> machines,
                            java.lang.String sourceDir,
                            java.lang.String destDir,
                            int maxThreads,
                            int MaxNumberOfTries)
        This method gets the reduce results from distant machines.
        Parameters:
        machines - List of machines
        sourceDir - Name of the directory in which the results were be placed
        destDir - Name of the directory in which the results will be placed
        maxThreads - Maximum size of the ThreadPoolExecuor
        MaxNumberOfTries - Maximum number of times we may try to establish an ssh connection

      • outputResults

        public void outputResults​(java.lang.String dir,
                          java.lang.String destDir,
                          java.lang.String destFile)
        This method concatenates the retrieved files and orders the results.
        Parameters:
        dir - Name of the directory in which the results were be placed
        destDir - Name of the directory in which the result will be placed
        destFile - Name of the file that will contain the results

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method. Tests ssh connection, generates and distributes splits. Runs all MapReduce phases in distant machines. Retrieves and outputs results.
        Parameters:
        args - [0] Name of the file that contains the list of available machines
        args - [1] Name of the file to work with
        args - [2] Name of the working directory
        args - [3] SSH username
        args - [4] Amount of splits to generate -1
